name: mediamanager
description: MediaManager is a media collection organizer and categorizer. It provides a web interface to upload, tag, group, and browse files such as images, videos, and documents in a self-hosted environment.
features: File upload: Upload images, videos, and documents through drag-and-drop or file browser.
Tag system: Apply custom tags to files for flexible categorization and filtering.
Category organization: Group media into categories and subcategories for structured browsing.
Search functionality: Find files quickly by name, tags, or metadata using full-text search.
Preview generation: Automatically create thumbnails and previews for visual file identification.
Bulk operations: Tag, move, or delete multiple files simultaneously for efficient management.
Metadata editing: Add descriptions, titles, and custom fields to files for better organization.
Access control: Set permissions to control who can view, upload, or modify files.
Gallery view: Browse media in grid or list layouts with sorting and filtering options.
Download management: Download individual files or entire collections as compressed archives.
Storage monitoring: Track disk usage and available space across media libraries.
API access: Integrate media management into external applications via REST API.
